_header: It is a merchant and spendeth not

CULIi38.First Lines:
Hiȝt is a marchaund and spendeȝt nouthhiȝt is a
                    moter and spkket nouth…
CULIi38.Last Lines:
…hiȝt hateȝ þi wylle & no fohiȝt
                    wepeȝ is felle & suffreȝ no wo
CULIi38.Editions:
Erb,  Peter C. 
             “Vernacular Material for Preaching in MS Camb. Univ. Lib.
                Ii.III.8.” 
             Mediaeval Studies
         33 (1971): 63-84: 69-70.
